data.name: Dripping Finance
data.description:
We are focused on providing stakers of Drip tokens long-term dividends leading to passive income and the key to this is balance between rewards release and multiple dividend sources.
Dividends

Dripping Finance dividends system is built for long-term sustainability unlike RFI clones or farming projects where there's insane APYs, rewards are given out too easily and that leads to project value disappearing with one week. We do things differently.

We are able to motivate stakers to play the long-term game by utilizing multiple dividend (staking reward) sources and applying fees to staking & withdrawing. To understand exactly how this works, read our Medium article above.

Dividends sources schema: https://i.imgur.com/lrY9f1r.png

Unlike similar high volatility and risky staking focused currencies, $DRIP brings an entirely innovative and unique perspective to staking. With the primary aim of providing stakers with universally sustainable income, stakers are able to earn back from their initial investments leading to potentially life changing income security and longevity. With a 2% daily dividends, who wouldn’t want to stake their $DRIP?
Tokenomics

Fixed Total Supply : 100k
Circulating Supply : 8760 Drip
Liquidity locked on DxSale

Learn more about our project here: https://www.reddit.com/r/drippingfinance/wiki/index
